Text: Thanks a lot man and a million thanks goes to your friends to.Nice game.And finaly Kobe is back for the playoffs..Btw i had some problems with the vid of the 1 game of the playoffs with Knicks vs Heat720p.Some black screens when i watched the game sudenly apears but i could watch the game but with black screens some times in my TV.Was there a problem with that video clip or it was something to do with my external HD or my digital media player.!?Does anyone else told u something similar.??
You're welcome mate! Those black screens are parts of the rip. Is nothing wrong with your hardware.
